title: Paycheck Calculator | Accurate US Federal Withholding, FICA & Net Pay

formulas.title: Formula (extracted LaTeX)
formulas.latex: C_{\text{401k}} = W_g \cdot r_{\text{401k}}, \quad W_{\text{FIT}} = W_g - C_{\text{401k}} - C_{125}, \quad W_{\text{FICA}} = W_g - C_{125}
formulas.raw: C_{\text{401k}} = W_g \cdot r_{\text{401k}}, \quad W_{\text{FIT}} = W_g - C_{\text{401k}} - C_{125}, \quad W_{\text{FICA}} = W_g - C_{125}

formulas.title: Formula (extracted LaTeX)
formulas.latex: I_{\text{ann}}=\max\!\big(0,\, W_{\text{FIT}}\cdot P + O - D_{\text{std}} - D_{4b}\big),\quad T_{\text{ann}}=\text{TaxBrackets}(I_{\text{ann}},\text{status})
formulas.raw: I_{\text{ann}}=\max\!\big(0,\, W_{\text{FIT}}\cdot P + O - D_{\text{std}} - D_{4b}\big),\quad T_{\text{ann}}=\text{TaxBrackets}(I_{\text{ann}},\text{status})

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Let pay periods/year be \(P\), gross wages \(W_g\) per period, with: \[ C_{\text{401k}} = W_g \cdot r_{\text{401k}}, \quad W_{\text{FIT}} = W_g - C_{\text{401k}} - C_{125}, \quad W_{\text{FICA}} = W_g - C_{125} \] \[ I_{\text{ann}}=\max\!\big(0,\, W_{\text{FIT}}\cdot P + O - D_{\text{std}} - D_{4b}\big),\quad T_{\text{ann}}=\text{TaxBrackets}(I_{\text{ann}},\text{status}) \] \[ \text{FIT} = \max\!\left(0,\frac{T_{\text{ann}}-C_{\text{dep}}}{P}\right) + E,\quad \text{SS} = \min(B_{\text{SS}}^{\text{rem}},\, W_{\text{FICA}})\cdot 6.2\% \] \[ \text{MED} = W_{\text{FICA}}\cdot 1.45\% \;+\; \max\!\left(0, \frac{W_{\text{FICA}}\cdot P - 200{,}000}{P}\right)\cdot 0.9\%,\quad \text{Net}=W_g-C_{\text{401k}}-C_{125}-\text{FIT}-\text{SS}-\text{MED}-\text{PostTax} \] Formulas match your original methodology and labels. :contentReference[oaicite:10]{index=10}

variables.meaning: property tax (annual or monthly depending on input)
